nodes.text: Pandath was the capital of Taanab. A spaceport, Lando Calrissian departed from this city to engage Norulac pirates in the Battle of Taanab. A Jedi chapter house was established in the city to house initiates in the Agricultural Corps.
On 35:8:16, the Imperial HoloVision node based in the city reported the crash of the supply ship Ambitious at the B'Knos mining colony.
Pandath was misspelled Pendath in The Truce at Bakura Sourcebook.
